channel.title: Data Warehousing on DI Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in Data Warehousing on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: [video] – Rethink the Data Warehouse with Hadoop and Hive
item.description: Here is a great video explaining how Facebook uses Hadoop and Hive to build Data Warehouses and analyse their huge ammount of data. Every day Facebook gets around 4TB+ of compressed data, which is amazing and also difficult to be analysed. [vimeo 7111203] (via Cloudera)

item.title: [video] – The History of Business Intelligence
item.description: I have found a really nice video explaining Business Intelligence as a concept and highlighting the development phases of Business Intelligence through the history. [youtube _1y5jBESLPE]
